thread.title: Companies pay up to $12m in bid to win best Super Bowl ad
thread.title_full: Companies pay up to $12m in bid to win best Super Bowl ad

title: Companies pay up to $12m in bid to win best Super Bowl ad
text: The real reason we're tuning in: Budweiser, Kia and Audi fork out up to $12m in bid to win the battle of the Super Bowl ads Approximately 110 million people tuned in to watch Super Bowl LI The average cost of a 30-second ad this year is $5million, up from $4.8 last year Some companies paid upwards of $12million all in for the opportunity to advertise during the Super Bowl The majority are light-hearted, some use the time to discuss important issues such as gender equality and immigration This year's batch features many celebrity and professional athlete cameos
